attributes.action: To give all horse, living in regions whose name begins with a vowel, tap dancing lessons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that herds of tap dancing horse is excatly what the uk economic needs. However we understand that tap dancing lessons are costly and it is because of this reason we have limited it to only certain regions. We hope the future that maybe some horse bally schools could open.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
